roleset.name: to cover with shoes
roleset.note: SHOE-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from shoe.01-v)

role.descr: Shoes themselves, what type of shoes

example.name: Ferrier as shoer
example.text: He shoes racehorses, ponies, sport horses and even the odd donkey!
example.arg: racehorses, ponies, sport horses, and even the odd donkey!

example.name: Passive, descriptive
example.text: Though [her feet]-1 were shod *-1 in flip flops, they were quickly replaced with heels when she arrived at the conference center.
